Annie.name: AnnieБ
Annie.title: Ббthe Dark ChildБ
Annie.lore:
БбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлПпФфЦцЧчШшЩщЪъЮюЯяБбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлПпФфЦцЧчШшЩщЪъЮюЯяБбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлПпФфЦцЧчШшIn the time shortly before the League, there were those within the sinister city-state of Noxus who did not agree with the evils perpetrated by the Noxian High Command. The High Command had just put down a coup attempt from the self-proclaimed Crown Prince Raschallion, and a crack down on any form of dissent against the new government was underway. These political and social outcasts, known as the Gray Order, sought to leave their neighbors in peace as they pursued dark arcane knowledge. The leaders of this outcast society were a married couple: Gregori Hastur, the Gray Warlock, and his wife Amoline, the Shadow Witch. Together they led an exodus of magicians and other intelligentsia from Noxus, resettling their followers beyond the Great Barrier to the northern reaches of the unforgiving Voodoo Lands. Though survival was a challenge at times, the Gray Order's colony managed to thrive in a land where so many others would have failed.ЩшШчЧцЦфФпПлЛйЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБяЯюЮъЪщЩшШчЧцЦфФпПлЛйЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБяЯюЮъЪщЩшШчЧцЦфФпПлЛйЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБ

БбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлПпФфЦцЧчШшЩщЪъЮюЯяБбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлПпФфЦцЧчШшЩщЪъЮюЯяБбГгДдЖжYears after the exodus, Gregori and Amoline had a child: Annie. Early on, Annie's parents knew there was something special about their daughter. At the age of two, Annie miraculously ensorcelled a shadow bear - a ferocious denizen of the petrified forests outside the colony - turning it into her pet. To this day she keeps her bear ''Tibbers'' by her side, often keeping him spellbound as a stuffed doll to be carried like a child's toy. The combination of Annie's lineage and the dark magic of her birthplace have given this little girl tremendous arcane power. It is this same girl who now finds herself as one of the most sought-after champions within the League of Legends - even by the city-state that would have exiled her parents had they not fled beforehand.ЗжЖдДгГбБяЯюЮъЪщЩшШчЧцЦфФпПлЛйЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБяЯюЮъЪщЩшШчЧцЦфФпПлЛйЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБ

БбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛл''Annie may be one of the most powerful champions ever to have fought in a Field of Justice. I shudder to think of her capabilities when she becomes an adult.''лЛйЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБ
БбГг-- High Councilor Kiersta MandrakeГбБ
Annie.blurb: БбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлПпФфЦцЧчШшЩщЪъЮюЯяБбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлПпФфЦцЧчШшЩщЪъЮюЯяБбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлПпФфЦцЧчШшIn the time shortly before the League, there were those within the sinister city-state of Noxus who did not agree with the evils perpetrated by the Noxian ...
allytips: БбГгДдЖжStoring a stun for use with her ultimate can turn the tide of a team fight.ЖдДгГбБ
БбГгДдЖжЗзStriking killing blows on minions with Disintegrate enables Annie to farm extremely well early in the game.ИзЗжЖдДгГбБ
БбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙMolten Shield is a good spell to cast to work up to Annie's stun, so sometimes it's beneficial to grab at least 1 rank in it early.ЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБ
enemytips: БбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙAnnie's summoned bear, Tibbers, burns opposing units around himself. Try to keep your distance from him after he's been summoned.ЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБ
БбГгДдSummoner Smite can be used to help take down Tibbers.ДгГбБ
БбГгДдЖжЗзKeep an eye out for a white, swirling power around Annie. It means she's ready to unleash her stun.зЗжЖдДгГбБ

spells.name: БDisintegrateБ
spells.description: БбГгДдЖжЗзAnnie hurls a mana-infused fireball, dealing damage and refunding the mana cost if it destroys the target.ИзЗжЖдДгГбБ
spells.tooltip: Deals Б{{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})БбГгДдЖ magic damage. Mana cost is refunded if Disintegrate kills the target.ЖдДгГбБ

spells.description: БбГгДдЖжAnnie casts a blazing cone of fire, dealing damage to all enemies in the area.жЖдДгГбБ
spells.tooltip: БбГCasts a cone of fire dealing ГбБ{{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})БбГг magic damage to all enemies in the area.гГбБ

spells.name: БбMolten ShieldБ
spells.description: БбГгДдЖжЗзIncreases Annie's Armor and Magic Resist and damages enemies who hit Annie with basic attacks.ЗжЖдДгГбБ
spells.tooltip: БбГгIncreases Armor and Magic Resist by ГбБ{{ e1 }} for Б{{ e3 }}Бб seconds. Deals Б{{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }})БбГгДд magic damage to enemies who attack Annie with basic attacks.дДгГбБ

spells.name: БбSummon: TibbersБ
spells.description: БбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйAnnie wills her bear Tibbers to life, dealing damage to units in the area. Tibbers can attack and also burns enemies that stand near him.ЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБ
spells.tooltip:
БбГгTibbers appears in a burst of flame dealing ДгГбБ{{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})БбГг magic damage to enemies in the target area.ДгГбБ

БбГгTibbers chases down enemies and deals гГбБ{{ e4 }} (+Б{{ a2 }})БбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙй magic damage each second to nearby foes. He lasts for 45 seconds and his Health, Armor, Magic Resist, and Attack Damage increase with rank.йЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБ

БбГгДдЖжЗзИиTibbers can be controlled by holding the alt key and using the right mouse button or by reactivating this ability.ИзЗжЖдДгГбБ

passive.name: БPyromaniaБ
passive.description: БбГгДдЖжЗAfter casting 4 spells, Annie's next offensive spell will stun the target for 1.75 seconds.ЗжЖдДгГбБ
